query: Could you assist in creating a 3-day travel plan starting from Bozeman and ending in Atlanta for a group of 7? Our trip will span from March 24th to March 26th, 2022. We have a budget of $14,000 and would appreciate pet-friendly accommodations, as we will have our pets with us.
